name: Main Brewery
hoursOfOperation:
Fri - Sat: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm
Sun: 11:00 am - 8:00 pm

brewery.name: Wild Earth Brewing
brewery.description: One of Washington's new artisanal breweries, Wild Earth Brewing handcrafts its products in the foothills of the Cascade Mountains. Brewed in small batches for our onsite taproom and limited distribution of kegs and bottles around the area. We aim to continually challenge ourselves through unique production methods and ingredients to bring our customers the best beer possible. Stop by our taproom for the latest bottle offerings, growler fills, or to enjoy a fresh pint of our latest batch.
